Room.Name: Royal Stairway
Room.ShortDescription: You are on the stairway reserved for Prince Rutger and his family.
Room.LongDescription: Rutger seldom invites guests to use this stairway, preferring instead to use the Stairway of the Nobles on the north side of the balcony when he is with someone. Looking west you can see the golden door leading to the pledge room. The Grand Assembly Hall is south of you.
